name: Grade The Exam!
description:
Good morning, teacher!

Today we need to grade our exams, the class delegates can help you with that task.

Pick up your phone and go to happyfuntimes.net!

 Press the stamps to calificate a exam: 

  • F give you 1 point
  •  C is 2 points
  •  A+ will give you 3! 

But be carefull, if someone choose the same calification as you, neither both will win points! 

Is The Law of the Equilibrate Exchange.

---IMPORTANT---

Press R for quick reboot,  or D for kick the last player if you have any erros.
